trans-unit.source: List of Oracle virtual machine images
trans-unit.target: List of Oracle virtual machine images

trans-unit.source: Get the list of Oracle images in the Azure Gallery and learn how to create an Oracle virtual machine based on one.
trans-unit.target: Get the list of Oracle images in the Azure Gallery and learn how to create an Oracle virtual machine based on one.

trans-unit.source: List of Oracle virtual machine images
trans-unit.target: List of Oracle virtual machine images

trans-unit.source: To create virtual machines based on Oracle images, sign in to the [Azure portal](https://ms.portal.azure.com/), click **Marketplace**, click **Compute**, and then type **Oracle** into the Search box.
trans-unit.target: To create virtual machines based on Oracle images, sign in to the [Azure portal](https://ms.portal.azure.com/), click **Marketplace**, click **Compute**, and then type **Oracle** into the Search box.

trans-unit.source: Select an image and follow the instructions to set up the image on Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: Select an image and follow the instructions to set up the image on Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Note that Oracle images by Microsoft on the [Azure portal](https://ms.portal.azure.com/) run on Windows, and Oracle images by Oracle run on Oracle Linux.
trans-unit.target: Note that Oracle images by Microsoft on the [Azure portal](https://ms.portal.azure.com/) run on Windows, and Oracle images by Oracle run on Oracle Linux.

trans-unit.source: Windows-based virtual machine images
trans-unit.target: Windows-based virtual machine images

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the available Oracle virtual machine images that run on Windows Server on Azure.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of the available Oracle virtual machine images that run on Windows Server on Azure.

trans-unit.source: These images are pay-as-you-go, meaning that Oracle license fees are included in the usage of these images.
trans-unit.target: These images are pay-as-you-go, meaning that Oracle license fees are included in the usage of these images.

trans-unit.source: You can also bring your own license to run Oracle software on Windows or Linux.
trans-unit.target: You can also bring your own license to run Oracle software on Windows or Linux.

trans-unit.source: Here are complete details on [pricing and licensing for Azure Virtual Machines and virtual machine gallery images](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/virtual-machines/#oracle-software).
trans-unit.target: Here are complete details on [pricing and licensing for Azure Virtual Machines and virtual machine gallery images](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/virtual-machines/#oracle-software).

trans-unit.source: Click the **Oracle** tab for details on specific Oracle pricing.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Oracle** tab for details on specific Oracle pricing.

trans-unit.source: Oracle Linux virtual machine images
trans-unit.target: Oracle Linux virtual machine images

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the available preconfigured Oracle virtual machine images that run on Oracle Linux on Azure.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of the available preconfigured Oracle virtual machine images that run on Oracle Linux on Azure.

trans-unit.source: You are expected to bring your own license for these images, as Oracle license fees are not included in the usage of these preconfigured virtual machine images.
trans-unit.target: You are expected to bring your own license for these images, as Oracle license fees are not included in the usage of these preconfigured virtual machine images.

trans-unit.source: You can also bring your own license to install and run Oracle software on custom virtual machines on Windows or Linux.
trans-unit.target: You can also bring your own license to install and run Oracle software on custom virtual machines on Windows or Linux.

trans-unit.source: Here are complete details on [Oracle licensing on Azure](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/cloud/faq-1963009.html#support).
trans-unit.target: Here are complete details on [Oracle licensing on Azure](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/cloud/faq-1963009.html#support).

trans-unit.source: And here are details on creating virtual machines using [your own images](virtual-machines-create-upload-vhd-windows-server.md).
trans-unit.target: And here are details on creating virtual machines using [your own images](virtual-machines-create-upload-vhd-windows-server.md).

trans-unit.source: To learn about this and other methods of migrating Oracle and other workloads to Azure, see [Different ways to create a Windows-based virtual machine](virtual-machines-windows-choices-create-vm.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn about this and other methods of migrating Oracle and other workloads to Azure, see [Different ways to create a Windows-based virtual machine](virtual-machines-windows-choices-create-vm.md).
